Room.Name: Wall Road West/Black Market Alley
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side of the road there is a burned building. A sign says, "Keep Out - Order of Brownhaven Militia." No ordinary fire swept through here. You can see all the indications of a magical flame. At one time this was the home of Khallazar and Gharalara before they separated. She was a powerful cleric, dedicated to her deity, and he was a young alchemist. What he saw in her, no one could tell. She was considerably older than he.
